summary: The diff adds a new frontend Smoke Test page/route and makes substantial backend data model/storage changes (e.g., BlinkSummary and maps), but it does not implement any mechanism to force a clean rebuild/redeploy to the live canister or to capture verbatim build/deploy error output as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: Force a clean rebuild of the Eye-R project (frontend + backend) and redeploy the resulting build artifacts to the live canister (not draft).
missing_requirements.reason: No changes in the diff indicate build pipeline/scripts/commands for clean rebuild, cache clearing, or deployment to the live canister; the modifications are application code changes only.

missing_requirements.requirement: If the rebuild or redeploy fails, capture and present the exact build/deploy error output (verbatim) including the failing command, exit code, and the full compiler/toolchain error text.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not add any logging/reporting for build or deploy failures (no CI scripts, deploy scripts, or command wrappers capturing stdout/stderr and exit codes). The added 'Smoke Test' page is a runtime connectivity check, not build/deploy error capture.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new 'Smoke Test' page and route (/smoke-test) with UI to verify frontend-backend communication and display test status.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest asks for forced clean rebuild/redeploy and verbatim build/deploy error reporting, not adding new UI pages/routes for runtime smoke testing.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend introduces a new BlinkSummary type and corresponding storage (blinkSummariesMap) plus related structural changes in backend/main.mo.
hallucinated_features.reason: These backend data model changes are unrelated to forcing a clean rebuild/redeploy or capturing deploy errors, and appear to be new/expanded functionality beyond the deployment-unblocking scope.
